titleStmt.title: Humour out of breath A comedie diuers times latelie acted, by the Children of the Kings Reuells. Written by Iohn Day.
titleStmt.author: Day, John, 1574-1640?

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Richard Bradock] for Iohn Helmes, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstons Church-yard in Fleet-street,
